## createAlwaysEnabledStyle() function

Create a style function that always applies colors (for xterm.js).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function createAlwaysEnabledStyle(): StyleFn;
```
**Returns:**

[StyleFn](./machine.stylefn.md)

Chainable style function with full color support
